name: AirRaidAlarm
0:
”Alexa, wake me up at 7:00 AM to air raid alarm tone”
”Alexa, set an alarm at 7:00 AM to air raid alarm tone”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: air raid alarm
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Need a REAL alarm to get you out of bed each morning? Are cutesy synthesizer clips and "relaxing" nature sounds making you miss your alarm and sleep in? You can't AFFORD to miss school or work so get an alarm that matches your hectic, bolt-out-of-bed, fast-paced lifestyle. 
GET AIR RAD ALARM!

Air Raid Alarm features 2 free air raid warning alarms: "Classic Air Raid," and "Klaxon," plus a special get-out-of-bed snooze siren: "Euro Ambulance Siren."

Get Air Raid Gold to unlock seven MORE sirens and alarms including: "Noon Whistle," "Sci-fi Siren," "Modern Air Raid," "Modern Air Raid II," "Hand-cranked Siren," "Fire Alarm from Hell," and everyone's favorite - "Tornado Siren."

FEEDBACK AND SUPPORT: If you enjoyed Air Raid Alarm, please leave us a review telling us what you love, and what alarms you want to hear next!
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
